reviews.text: This is an okay place to stay. First of all, be sure to request a room near the back...the rooms towards the front are very loud due to being close to the parking lot and busy street.
reviews.title: Not bad...
Excellent value
reviews.text: One warning, there are cockroaches in the rooms, but other than that, they're decent. We did have a room with a kitchenette so that may be why there were critters.
The free breakfast was very good, the service was friendly.
reviews.title: Best Western Nice Surpise
Pleasant rooms great price
reviews.text: Not a spectacular motel from the outside, but the cleanest room we've ever stayed in! We had a room with a kitchenette and everything was spotless. The only problem we had was the the motel is next door to a Denny's Restaurant with a lounge, and at 1:00 a.m. someone with a VERY loud stereo in their car pulled into the parking lot and sat there for nearly an hour with the stereo turned up high. We didn't call the front desk because we didn't think they could do anything about it. The next morning when we checked out my husband mentioned it and was told that they've had that problem before and can't get any cooperation from Denny's. He suggested next time that we should call the police, which we will. Other than that situation, which isn't the motel's fault, it was a very pleasant stay.
